Address.label: Address
Address.value: 1030 WEST GEORGIA STREET,SUITE 1507, VANCOUVER, British Columbia, V6E 2Y3, Canada

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: American Lithium Corp is a Canada-based exploration-stage company. Principally, it is engaged in the acquisition, exploration, and development of lithium deposits. The properties of the company include Colorado Property, Fish Lake Valley, Atlantis, Fish South Property, Gap Lode Claim Block Property, TLC Property, FALCHANI property, Macusani and Extinction Ridge Property.
